body_html:
Finally it worked for me too. But it was not obvious that /bin folder within cudann was supposed to be add. Also this instruction on the website is inaccurate because CUDA 8.0 documentation doesn't mention setting up %path%. And that is not even relevant, since the path is added automatically by the installer. The main problem is with cudann nvidia's instructions. Anyway, hopefully better installation process will be developed in the future. Thanks guys Radek

Also this instruction on the website is inaccurate because CUDA 8.0
documentation doesn't mention setting up %path%. And that is not even

The main problem is with cudann nvidia's instructions.

body:
Finally it worked for me too. But it was not obvious that /bin folder
within cudann was supposed to be add.

Also this instruction on the website is inaccurate because CUDA 8.0
documentation doesn't mention setting up %path%. And that is not even
relevant, since the path is added automatically by the installer.

The main problem is with cudann nvidia's instructions.



Anyway, hopefully better installation process will be developed in the
future. Thanks guys

Radek
